name: stock_quotes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool real_time_quotes.
Tool description: Real-time and historical data of stocks, cryptocurrencies and forex based on multiple data sources such as Yahoo Finance
API description: Fetches real-time stock data for given stock symbols using the Holistic Finance Stock Data RapidAPI.

symbols.description: A comma-separated string of stock symbols for which to fetch the stock data.
